resources.string: Revenir en haut de la page

"L'identifiant ne doit pas contenir que des espaces"
"L'identifiant ne doit pas contenir de <, >, ou /"
Le nom ne peut pas faire plus de 20 caractères
Le nom doit faire plus de 2 caractères
La date de naissance entrée est invalide

La dernière version de cette application est déjà installée

Basculé sur le moteur de recherche fréquent

"N'autorisez pas les sites à accéder et à enregistrer les cookies. Les fonctionnalités de certains sites peuvent ne pas fonctionner correctement une fois que vous avez sélectionné cette option."
"Cette adresse URL ne peut pas être mis dans les favoris."
Le favori doit avoir un nom
Le favori doit contenir une adresse URL

"En appuyant sur \"Connexion\", vous acceptez de synchroniser automatiquement les favoris et l'historique de navigation. Vous pourrez désactiver la synchronisation dans \"Mon compte\" ultérieurement."
"Sélectionnez les éléments à synchroniser. Désactivez pour arrêter la synchronisation."
"Synchroniser les favoris et l'historique de navigation"

Glissez vers le haut pour fermer
La page que vous souhaitez voir contient des données qui ont déjà été soumises. Si vous les envoyer à nouveau, les actions précédentes (par ex. les recherches ou les achats) seront répétés.
"Impossible d'envoyer autant d'éléments à la fois"

"Vous pouvez déplacer de 3 à 7 éléments vers la partie supérieure de l'écran"

Vous ne recevrez pas de services de contenu personnalisés si vous désactivez cette fonctionnalité.

Visitez facebook.com/device et entrez le code ci-dessus.

"Pour connecter votre compte, ouvrez l'application Facebook sur votre appareil mobile et vérifiez les notifications."
Vous avez le contrôle - choisissez les informations que vous souhaitez partager avec les applications.
"Quelque chose s'est mal passé. Essayez d'actualiser la page."

%1$s ne fonctionnera que si vous activez les services Google Play, qui ne sont pas présents sur votre appareil.
%1$s rencontre des problèmes avec les services Google Play. Veuillez réessayer.
%1$s ne fonctionnera pas sans les services Google Play, qui ne sont pas pris en charge par votre appareil.
%1$s ne fonctionnera que si vous mettez à jour les services Google Play.
Mettre à jour les services Google Play
%1$s ne fonctionnera pas sans les services Google Play, qui sont actuellement en cours de mise à jour.
Nouvelle version des services Google Play requise. Il se mettra à jour sous peu.
Confirmer le numéro de téléphone associé

Vous ne pourrez pas restaurer les éléments supprimés.

"Des millions d'applications et de jeux gratuits. Installez sans vous connecter."

"Vous pouvez maintenant gérer des vidéos, des chansons et des images locales à l'aide de Mi Browser !"
Le nom du dossier ne peut pas être vide

"Plus d'applications, une vitesse plus rapide et moins d'utilisation de données dans l'App Store"

Navigateur passé en mode sans échec
Vous pouvez désormais naviguer en privé et les autres personnes qui utilisent cet appareil ne verront pas votre activité. Cependant, les téléchargements et les favoris seront toujours enregistrés.
"Mi Browser n'enregistrera pas les informations suivantes : • Votre historique de navigation • Cookies et données de sites • Informations saisies dans les formulaires"

"Couldn't read file. File permissions may be preventing access."
It took too long for %s0 to respond.

This page on %s0 might have been moved or deleted.
"This page isn't working because %s0 didn't send any data."
"This page isn't working because %s0 sent an invalid response."
"This page isn't working because %s0 redirected you too many times."

(Users outside China should enter the mobile phone number in the following format: +[area code][phone number], e.g.: +91 817282982)
Password must be 8-16 characters long and combine at least two of the following: digits, letters, and special symbols (e.g. 123abc@#, or 123abc, or abc@#).
Too many accounts have been associated with this number. Try a different one.
You need to sign in again

"I've read and agreed to all of the following terms and conditions."

%s wants to control your MIDI device
For signing in and syncing bookmarks
You can restrict notifications for this website in the settings.
Allow Mi Browser to access camera in the Settings first
Allow Mi Browser to access your location in the Settings first
Allow Mi Browser to access microphone in the Settings first
Allow Mi Browser to access internal storage in the Settings first
Receive personalized content recommendations and ads
"Les enregistrements de l'historique des téléchargements seront supprimés une fois les éléments associés déplacés vers un dossier privé."
Tap the icon above to view your private folder
Original files will be deleted as well.
"Can't add ongoing downloads to private folder"
Removed items will be saved in their original location.
This phone has been associated with several Mi Accounts in a short period of time. Try using another phone number.
<font color=#ff2458>%s</font> of the gamers also like these
Allow this site to open a pop-up window?
Pages might load slower when this feature is on
Switch to the frequent search engine
"Send website URL to Mi's servers to check if it's secure"
Allow Browser to access the URLs of the websites you visit to receive more relevant recommendations.
"Effacer l'historique du bloqueur de publicités maintenant ?"
Load content faster using proxy servers
Allow the browser to resolve domain names before resources (e.g. files or links) get requested
Swipe from the left or right edge
"Override a website's request to control zoom behavior"
Display a download button on images and videos from social media websites
Clear all the items cached during your browsing?
Mi Browser caches some web pages to load them faster next time you visit them. Clearing cache deletes the items saved by sites during your browsing.
Clear all cookies stored on your device. Cookies are created by the sites you visit and then stored on your device so that you could enjoy a more convenient browsing experience.
Clear all data used for filling out forms automatically
"Effacer tous les enregistrements de l'historique de navigation maintenant ?"
"Effacer tous les enregistrements de l'historique de navigation"
Clear all site settings. Sites will ask for permissions next time you visit them.
Allow browser to request access to your location
"We'll replace your current Performance ID with a randomly generated new one."
"Allow sites to save, read, and use cookies to remember your preferences even if you don't visit these web pages"

"Select this option to inform sites that you don't want them to collect or track your browsing data. Different sites react to such requests differently. Some sites won't use your previous browsing history to personalize their ads for you, while others still may collect and use your browsing history for various purposes (ensuring security, providing content, displaying relevant ads, and more)."
Save usernames and passwords for websites and autofill them automatically. Saved items will be encrypted and stored only on this device.
Share the URLs of the sites you visit with Xiaomi
Remember the data you type in forms and autofill it automatically. Saved items will be encrypted and stored only on this device.
"Show a security warning when there is a problem with the site's certificate"
Mi Browser makes web browsing fast, convenient, and secure. Set Mi Browser as your default browser?
Mi Browser makes web browsing fast, convenient, and secure. Switch browsers anyway?
Sites need to ask and get your permission to use your camera (recommended)
Turn on camera permissions in <font color=#247BFF>Android Settings</font>.
Most site features might not work properly
Block third party cookies in Incognito mode
Some site features might not work properly

Cookies are the files created by sites you have visited in order to remember your preferences. Third party cookies are created by other websites, which are the owners of the content (e.g. ads or images) that you see on the pages you visit.
Sites need to ask and get your permission to access your location info (recommended)
Turn on location permissions in <font color=#247BFF>Android Settings</font>.
Sites need to ask and get your permission to use your microphone (recommended)
Turn on microphone permissions in <font color=#247BFF>Android Settings</font>.
Sites can ask whether you want to receive notifications
Allow sites to play protected content (recommended)
Sites need to ask and get your permission to play protected content
"Don't allow sites to play protected content"
"Clear this site's data (including cookies) and reset its permissions now?"
Autocomplete searches based on browsing history, search engine suggestions, and popular websites
"This action requires uploading your Performance ID, which can't be done in Incognito mode. Leave Incognito mode and try again."
Your device needs to connect to the network for you to be able to withdraw consent. Check your network settings and try again.

After you revoke authorization, Mi Browser will stop collecting data, and all the related data will be deleted from the servers. This might make Mi Browser virtually unusable. Revoke authorization anyway?
Toggle the switch on and off to grant or revoke your authorization
Allow Xiaomi to collect and analyze user data in order to improve our products and services
Before using Browser, you must agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy.

Mi Browser needs to collect necessary personal information to provide you with the basic services. You can learn how we handle the information we collect in our Privacy Policy. You can always withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Mi Browser in Settings > Privacy & security. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using Mi Browser.
"To be able to search for apps on this device and know which apps are installed, Mi Browser needs to access app installation info, which won't be saved locally or uploaded in any form."
Welcome to Mi Browser! Our app provides the following services:
- Downloading images and videos from social media platforms
"Your feed won't receive updates after you turn this feature off. Turn off now?"
This website has already been added.
Show recently visited sites in new tab
You need to sign in to read more.
You need to pay to read the next chapter.
Turning this feature off may affect usage.
"If you change this file's extension, you may not be able to open it."
The file will be hidden after you change its extension.

This service need to ask your permission follows, we will strictly abide by relevant laws to protect your personal information:

Access Camera: experience real-time recording services for setting Avatar

If you do not agree to call the above permissions, this function will not work properly, but it will not affect your use of the basic functions of this application. You can choose to turn off the above permission call in the system settings to withdraw your consent.
"You've requested too many verification emails. Make sure that the verification email isn't in your inbox's Spam folder."
It may take some time to receive SMS. Start over anyway?

Scroll down to rate our app

Turning this feature off may create security risks.

Set Mi Browser as your default browser

La session a expiré. Connectez-vous à nouveau pour reconnecter ce compte.
"Trop d'essais. Essayez d'autres moyens de vous connecter."
"Couldn't connect to the network. Check your network settings and try again."
"A private connection to %s1 can't be established because your device's date and time (%s2) are incorrect."

"This channel is provided by %1$s. However, the date and time set on your device (%2$s) don't allow to establish a secure connection with %1$s. You can set the correct date and time or tap \"Continue\" if you still want to use this channel."

"This channel is provided by %1$s. However, Mi Browser can't verify that this server belongs to %1$s because its cerificate is invalid or has been revoked. This problem may be caused by incorrect configurations or blocked connection. Tap \"Continue\" if you still want to use this channel."
This certificate has an invalid date.
"The name of the site doesn't match the name on the certificate."
"This certificate isn't from a trusted authority."
There are problems with the security certificate for this site.
"Downloads require access to your device's storage"
Turn on to enter Command mode
Turn on to use Sandbox domain

"This file format isn't supported. Unpack this file and try again."
"Vous devez vérifier votre identité avant de mettre à jour l'e-mail de récupération."
Turn on to share usage stats with us when Incognito mode is on
"Wi-Fi isn't available. Use your mobile data connection instead?"

"User Experience Program helps us improve our products and services in a targeted manner, as well as introduce new features and services that are helpful to you. We'll start collecting and analyzing relevant data (e.g. product usage data) after you enroll in the program. By tapping \"Enroll\" below, you're agreeing to the terms and conditions of User Experience Program. You can always opt out in Settings > Privacy & security."
Light mode and Dark mode are available
Be in full control of your privacy

You can update system apps using mobile data. This might generate additional data fees.
The videos you added to favorites are here
